name: ApocalypticSoup's Racing Sim Experience (A.R.S.E)
description:
Enjoy a semi-realistic arcade racer solo or online with friends. With a selection of serious and wacky vehicles to choose from, take on your friends in some skill based drift racing. Drift mechanics are rewarding, though difficult to master.

Features

  • 6 Vehicles
  • 6 Tracks
  • Day/Night Tracks
  • Simple AI Racers
  • Interactive Animals
